statements: SELECT * FROM PurchaseHistory WHERE customer_id = '12345';
SELECT product_id, total_amount FROM PurchaseHistory ORDER BY purchase_date DESC;
SELECT customer_id, SUM(quantity) AS total_quantity FROM PurchaseHistory GROUP BY customer_id;
SELECT AVG(total_amount) AS avg_amount FROM PurchaseHistory;
SELECT * FROM PurchaseHistory WHERE quantity > 10 AND total_amount < 100.00;
SELECT * FROM PurchaseHistory WHERE customer_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000' ORDER BY purchase_date DESC, total_amount ASC
SELECT customer_id, SUM(quantity) AS total_quantity FROM PurchaseHistory GROUP BY customer_id HAVING total_quantity > 10
SELECT customer_id, product_id, total_amount FROM PurchaseHistory WHERE product_id = '456e89b7-12d3-45a6-4266-14174000123' ORDER BY total_amount DESC
SELECT customer_id, COUNT(DISTINCT product_id) AS unique_products FROM PurchaseHistory GROUP BY customer_id HAVING unique_products >= 3
SELECT customer_id, AVG(total_amount) AS avg_amount FROM PurchaseHistory GROUP BY customer_id HAVING avg_amount < 1000
SELECT customer_name, customer_email FROM Customers;
SELECT customer_name, customer_email FROM Customers WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM Purchases ORDER BY purchase_date DESC;
SELECT customer_name, purchase_date, purchase_amount FROM Customers INNER JOIN Purchases ON Customers.customer_id = Purchases.customer_id;
SELECT customer_name, customer_email FROM Customers WHERE customer_email LIKE '%gmail.com';
SELECT * FROM Customers WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT customer_name FROM Customers WHERE customer_email LIKE '%gmail.com';
SELECT customer_id, customer_name FROM Customers ORDER BY customer_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM Purchases WHERE purchase_amount > 1000 AND purchase_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31';
SELECT Customers.customer_id, Customers.customer_name, Purchases.purchase_date FROM Customers JOIN Purchases ON Customers.customer_id = Purchases.customer_id ORDER BY Purchases.purchase_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM customer_purchase_history ORDER BY purchase_date DESC;
SELECT product_id, total_amount FROM customer_purchase_history WHERE total_amount > 100 ORDER BY total_amount DESC;
SELECT product_id, purchase_date FROM customer_purchase_history WHERE customer_id = 1001;
SELECT campaign_name, start_date, budget FROM marketing_campaigns WHERE budget > 5000 ORDER BY budget DESC;
SELECT product_id, product_name, price FROM recommended_products WHERE category = 'electronics';
SELECT * FROM customer_purchase_history;
SELECT customer_id, purchase_date, total_amount FROM customer_purchase_history WHERE total_amount > 100;
SELECT product_name, price, category FROM recommended_products WHERE price < 50 ORDER BY price DESC;
SELECT campaign_name, start_date, budget FROM marketing_campaigns WHERE start_date > '2022-01-01' AND budget > 1000;

SELECT customer_id, purchase_date, total_amount, product_name, category FROM customer_purchase_history JOIN recommended_products ON customer_purchase_history.product_id = recommended_products.product_id;
SELECT * FROM customers;
SELECT name, email FROM customers WHERE registration_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT customer_id, COUNT(*) as total_orders FROM orders GROUP BY customer_id;
SELECT product_id, category, price FROM products ORDER BY price DESC;
SELECT c.name as customer_name, p.name as product_name, r.recommendation_score FROM customers c JOIN recommendations r ON c.customer_id = r.customer_id JOIN products p ON r.product_id = p.product_id;
SELECT * FROM customers;
SELECT name, email FROM customers WHERE registration_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT customer_id, name, email, registration_date FROM customers ORDER BY registration_date DESC;
SELECT product_id, name, category, price FROM products WHERE price > 50 ORDER BY price ASC;

SELECT c.name AS customer_name, p.name AS product_name, r.recommendation_score FROM customers c JOIN recommendations r ON c.customer_id = r.customer_id JOIN products p ON r.product_id = p.product_id WHERE r.recommendation_score > 3 ORDER BY r.recommendation_score DESC;
SELECT customer_name, customer_email FROM Customers;
SELECT * FROM Orders WHERE total_amount > 1000;
SELECT product_name, product_category, product_price FROM Products WHERE product_category = 'Electronics';
SELECT customer_name, order_date, total_amount FROM Customers JOIN Orders ON Customers.customer_id = Orders.customer_id;

SELECT Customers.customer_name, Products.product_name FROM Customers JOIN Recommendations ON Customers.customer_id = Recommendations.customer_id JOIN Products ON Recommendations.recommended_product_id = Products.product_id;
SELECT * FROM Customers;
SELECT customer_name, customer_email FROM Customers WHERE customer_phone = '+1234567890';
SELECT customer_name, customer_email, total_amount FROM Customers JOIN Orders ON Customers.customer_id = Orders.customer_id;
SELECT product_name, product_category FROM Products WHERE product_price > 50.00 ORDER BY product_category ASC;

SELECT customer_name, product_name, purchase_quantity FROM Customers JOIN Orders ON Customers.customer_id = Orders.customer_id JOIN Product_Purchases ON Orders.order_id = Product_Purchases.order_id JOIN Products ON Product_Purchases.product_id = Products.product_id WHERE purchase_quantity >= 5 ORDER BY customer_name ASC, purchase_quantity DESC;
